channel.title: Does the Carloop include CAN Bus Termination
channel.description: Does the Carloop hardware include CAN bus termination?

item.title: Does the Carloop include CAN Bus Termination
item.dc:creator: cyclin_al1
item.description:
@nlwelch,

No, Carloop does not include CANbus termination.

The termination of the OBD2 CANbus is supposed to be done by the car.
Therefore, Carloop does not need any termination, just like any other diagnostic tool that connects to the OBD2 port.

Read full topic
item.source: Does the Carloop include CAN Bus Termination
